name: Melonball Run!
description:
Frantic split screen rolling & racing game. Made for the #melongamejam 2017. Compete with a friend and race to the finish line. Your melon can splash sticky watermelon juice and knock over obstacles. First one to win three rounds wins the game!

NB: The level doesn't reset between rounds, so be careful not to make too much of a mess or you'll just slow yourself down.

Music by Andreas BuskControlsControllers (probably only work on Windows, can't test osX yet).

🍉 Left joystick to move

🍉 A to jump

🍉 X to juice it up!

Keyboard Player 1

🍉 Arrow keys

🍉 Right Shift to jump

🍉 Right Ctrl (Command on mac) to splash juice

Keyboard Player 2

🍉 WASD

🍉 Left Shift to jump

🍉 Left Ctrl (Command on mac) to spill your guts
